bill.title: Relating To The Hawaii State Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transgender, Queer, Plus Commission.
bill.description: Establishes the Hawaii state lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer, plus commission. Appropriates funds. Effective 12/31/2059. (SD1)

history.action: Pending introduction.
Introduced and Pass First Reading.
Referred to HSH, JUD, FIN, referral sheet 4
Bill scheduled to be heard by HSH on Wednesday, 01-29-20 8:30AM in House conference room 329.

The committees on HSH recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) San Buenaventura, Nakamura, Belatti, B. Kobayashi, Mizuno, Tokioka; Ayes with reservations: none; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Ward; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Say.
Reported from HSH (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 17-20) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with Representative(s) Okimoto voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) McDermott, Ward voting no (2) and Representative(s) Ichiyama, Matsumoto, Say excused (3).
Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Wednesday, 02-12-20 3:00PM in House conference room 325.
The committee(s) on JUD recommend(s) that the measure be deferred until Thursday, 02-13-20 at 2:00pm.
Bill scheduled for decision making on Thursday, 02-13-20 2:00PM in conference room 325.

The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) C. Lee, San Buenaventura, Brower, Creagan, McKelvey, Nakashima, Perruso, Takayama, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Lowen, Say, Yamane.
Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 618-20) as amended in HD 2, recommending referral to FIN.

Report adopted. referred to the committee(s) on FIN as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) McDermott, Ward voting no (2) and Representative(s) Holt, Takayama excused (2).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Wednesday, 02-26-20 12:00PM in House conference room 308.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 12 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Cullen, Gates, Hashimoto, Holt, Kitagawa, B. Kobayashi, Matayoshi, Nakamura, Todd, Wildberger, Yamashita; Ayes with reservations: none; 1 Noes: Representative(s) McDermott; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Eli, Nishimoto.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 946-20), recommending passage on Third Reading.

Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) McDermott, Okimoto, Ward voting no (3) and Representative(s) Cabanilla Arakawa, DeCoite, Holt, Thielen excused (4). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 165).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to HMS/JDC, WAM.
The committee(s) on HMS/JDC has scheduled a public hearing on 03-09-20 3:10PM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on HMS recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in HMS were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ruderman, K. Rhoads, Riviere; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Ihara, Fevella.
The committee(s) on JDC deferred the measure until 03-10-20 10:05AM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on JDC recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDC were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) K. Rhoads, J.Keohokalole, Gabbard, Kim; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Fevella.
Reported from HMS/JDC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3655) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.

subjects.subject_name: Hawaii State Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transgender, Queer, Plus Commission

votes.desc: House Human Services & Homelessness: Passed, With Amendments
Senate Human Services: Passed, With Amendments
